screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: # this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 120,textsize[1] + 120) offset = 42 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 170 wsizex = textsize[0] + 170 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (420 > wsizex): wsizex = 420 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey) # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # move list listsize = (wsizex - 30,170) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) # center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

screen.name: ExtraMessageBox

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (12, 28), size = (72, 72), png = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (143, 29), size = (1025, 86), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 1), ], "fonts": [gFont("Yanone_R", 36)], "itemHeight": 110 }

screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["message"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... if self["message"].getText() != "": textsize = (textsize[0] + 180, textsize[1] + 135) else: textsize = (textsize[0] + 180, textsize[1] + 9)
count = len(self.list) if count > 5: count = 5 offset = 110 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 180 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 45
if (1035 > wsizex): wsizex = 1035 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["message"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 45, 110 * count) self["menu"].downstream_elements.downstream_elements.instance.move(ePoint(23, textsize[1] + 23)) self["menu"].downstream_elements.downstream_elements.instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] newheight = wsize[1] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - newheight)/2))
